participant_1.background:
I'm so clumsy that I even trip over my own feet sometimes.
i made my first movie when i was 18.
I love the sweet and juicy flavor of watermelon.
I check my to do list to see what's for the day.
i work in a used book store.

participant_2.background:
My family and friends are my favorite people because they are always there for me, no matter what.
i want to be an explorer.
sometimes , i like to relieve myself when on roses.
I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect.
i sometimes need to scream to feel alive.

content.text: Hello, my name is participant_1. How are you?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. My name is participant_2.
It is nice to meet you participant_1. What do you do for a living?
I am a professional explorer. I love to explore new places and learn about different cultures.
That sounds like an exciting job! I have always wanted to be an explorer.
You should go for it! It is a lot of fun.
What do you do for a living?
I work in a used book store. I love books and I like helping people find the perfect book for them.
That sounds like a great job. I love books too.
I love to cook and I love to travel. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
Those sound like great hobbies. I love to cook too. I do not get to travel as much as I would like, but I love to when I can.
We should go on a trip together sometime.
Great! We can start planning now.
